text: On a blog template is it possible to give an 'editor' the ability to customise the WYSIWYG editor? I'd like to give editors the ability to choose different colours panels, different list styles, different pull quote styles etc. Not sure if anyone's cracked the best way to achieve this?

Hey David, customization of the WYSIWYG editor is not available. Would you be able to post this to our <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/custom/page/page-id/ideaslandingpage|ideas community board> and then paste a link back to the <#C26E7JT8V|ideas> channel for others to upvote on if they feel this would be a good fit for them as well?
Hi AJ, Thanks for getting back to me, I've posted this in the ideas forum here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Customise-The-WYSIWYG-Editor/idi-p/327397>
